channel.title: Introduction on Roll 3dBooper
channel.description: Recent content in Introduction on Roll 3dBooper

item.title: Statement of Purpose
item.description: The Quick Version I have always been enticed by tabletop roleplaying games (RPGs) and have almost always been frustrated in my attempts to play them. Now, I’m taking the frustration and channeling it into a running a solo campaign in the hope of converting it for group play sometime in the future. This blog will document my experience of learning to play solo RPGs and hopefully capture some useful thoughts that others can use when coming to the hobby.
